trans-unit.source: A trigger action that changes the speed of a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Azione trigger che modifica la velocità di un <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Use a SetStoryboardSpeedRatio action with an <xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger> or a <xref:System.Windows.Trigger> to interactively control a storyboard's speed ratio.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare un'azione SetStoryboardSpeedRatio con un <xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger>o <xref:System.Windows.Trigger>per controllare in modo interattivo il rapporto di velocità di uno storyboard.</xref:System.Windows.Trigger> </xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SetStoryboardSpeedRatio.SpeedRatio%2A> property of SetStoryboardSpeedRatio to specify a new <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> animation speed as a ratio of the old animation speed.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SetStoryboardSpeedRatio.SpeedRatio%2A>SetStoryboardSpeedRatio per specificare una nuova proprietà <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>la velocità dell'animazione in rapporto di velocità dell'animazione precedente.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SetStoryboardSpeedRatio.SpeedRatio%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, if you set the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SetStoryboardSpeedRatio.SpeedRatio%2A> to 2, you double the speed of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> animations and if you set a value of 0.5, you reduce the speed by 50 percent.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, se si imposta la <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SetStoryboardSpeedRatio.SpeedRatio%2A>a 2, si raddoppia la velocità del <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>animazioni e se si imposta un valore pari a 0,5, si riduce la velocità del 50%.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SetStoryboardSpeedRatio.SpeedRatio%2A>

trans-unit.source: This object affects the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> at anytime after the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> begins.
trans-unit.target: Questo oggetto influisce sul <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>a in qualsiasi momento dopo il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>inizia.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>

trans-unit.source: For example, if you pause the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> and use the SetStoryboardSpeedRatio, when you resume the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>, it uses the new speed ratio.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, se si posiziona il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>e utilizzare SetStoryboardSpeedRatio, quando si riattiva il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>, viene utilizzato il nuovo rapporto di velocità.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>

trans-unit.source: Rather, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard> must reference the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>, which controls the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>.
trans-unit.target: Invece, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>deve fare riferimento la <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>di <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>che controlla la <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>

trans-unit.source: Pause, Resume, Stop, or Otherwise Control a Storyboard Interactively To be able to pause, resume, or otherwise control a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> interactively, set the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> property of its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> and use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction> object (such as <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard>, or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard>) to control it by referencing its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Pause, Resume, arresto o in caso contrario controllo un Storyboard in modo interattivo per essere in grado di sospendere, riprendere o controllare in caso contrario un <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A>impostato in modo interattivo, il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>proprietà del relativo <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>e utilizzare un <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction>oggetto (ad esempio <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard>, o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard>) per controllarlo facendo riferimento al relativo <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> is unspecified, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> cannot be interactively controlled after it is begun.
trans-unit.target: Se il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>di <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>non è specificato, il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A>non è possibile controllare in modo interattivo dopo l'inizio.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: See [How to: Use Event Triggers to Control a Storyboard After It Starts](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) for more information.
trans-unit.target: Vedere [procedura: utilizzare i trigger di evento per controllare un Storyboard dopo l'avvio](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) per ulteriori informazioni.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.SetStoryboardSpeedRatio"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.SetStoryboardSpeedRatio"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a new <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"></xref> animation speed as a ratio of the old animation speed.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un nuovo <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"> </xref> la velocità dell'animazione in rapporto di velocità dell'animazione precedente.

trans-unit.source: Use this property to specify a new <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> animation speed as a ratio of the old animation speed.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare questa proprietà per specificare un nuovo <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>la velocità dell'animazione in rapporto di velocità dell'animazione precedente.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>

trans-unit.source: For example, if you set the SpeedRatio to 2, you double the speed of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> animations and if you set a value of 0.5, you reduce the speed by 50 percent.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, se si imposta la SpeedRatio su 2, si raddoppia la velocità del <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>animazioni e se si imposta un valore pari a 0,5, si riduce la velocità del 50%.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>
Il rapporto di velocità per il <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"> </xref>.
